strapiPost.title: Early voting has started in NWA
strapiPost.content:
Early voting begins tomorrow, October 19, 2020 in Arkansas and runs to Election Day – November 3, 2020.

  • “The future of the republic is in the hands of the American Voter,” said Dwight D. Eisenhower.
  • Your 2020 voting guide can be found HERE
  • Your 2020 Arkansas Ballot Issue Voter Guide

Voter Turnout

In 2016, Arkansas had a voter turnout of 64.7% of its total registered voters, which was a margin higher than the national average of 55.7% of the voter age population.
